backend/main.mo: Main backend canister implementing access control, user profiles, order submission, and user-role bootstrap with storage and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old/new actor state types and a no-op migration that returns the existing state.
backend/old.mo: Historical actor/state definitions for the previous backend version, including older order and signature types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing frontend auto-invocation of ensureUserRole and related components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files used for build or documentation purposes.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Full deployment guide explaining backend canister deployment and frontend cPanel hosting setup.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom OKLCH color variables and dark-mode theme definitions.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root element and loading the main frontend bundle.
frontend/public/.htaccess: Optional Apache configuration for compression, caching, security headers, and MIME types for static hosting.
frontend/public/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide for hosting the frontend on cPanel and explaining architecture and upload steps.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling hash-based routing, authentication state, admin link visibility, and rendering top-level pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Gate component that checks admin authentication and conditionally renders loading, error, denial, or protected admin content.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentCon: Admin UI for viewing and updating payment/contact status and notes for an order.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A login/logout button that manages Internet Identity authentication state and handles login errors.
frontend/src/components/LoginRequiredScr: Displays a login-required prompt with explanation and a login button for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/SignaturePad.tsx: Canvas-based signature input component allowing drawing, clearing, and returning a PNG data URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Hook that checks whether the current authenticated actor has admin privileges, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureUserRole.ts: Ensures the authenticated user has the user role once per principal and refreshes related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, identity loading, and auth-client initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Defines hooks for submitting orders, fetching orders, and updating order or payment statuses using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile, ensuring role assignment and updating cache states.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables, typography, focus states, and layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Admin view for loading an order, previewing uploaded assets, and updating payment contact status with validation and feedback.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin orders page that fetches, filters, searches, and displays orders with status and payment filtering and click handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the landing page with a hero banner, navigation buttons, and feature overview sections.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Displays the user's orders, login prompt if unauthenticated, and detailed order view with status badges.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays an order confirmation screen and automatically opens a modal with payment contact details and accepted payment methods.
frontend/src/pages/OrderPage.tsx: Provides a full order form with validation, ID info inputs, photo/signature upload, and submits the order after authentication.
frontend/src/pages/PricesPage.tsx: Shows pricing details, feature highlights, and quantity-based examples with a button to navigate to the order page.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to view and update their profile info and shows admin access options if applicable.
frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts: Provides helpers to build base-path-safe URLs for static assets and documents using BASE_URL.
frontend/src/utils/fileValidation.ts: Validates client-side image files for type and size and converts files to byte arrays.
frontend/src/utils/idGenerators.ts: Generates random names and US-style addresses using predefined lists and randomization.
frontend/src/utils/orderFormatting.ts: Formats backend time values and maps order and payment statuses to readable labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/usStates.ts: Exports a constant list of US states with labels for dropdown use.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing role-assignment issues, fixes in progress, and related feature requests.
